tests.name: Environment Variables Check
tests.notes: NOTION_API_KEY and NOTION_DB_ID are accessible and working

tests.name: API Connectivity Test
tests.notes: GET /databases/${NOTION_DB_ID} returns 200 - Database found and accessible

tests.name: Database Schema Check
tests.notes: Database missing required properties: Status, Type, Priority, Owner, etc. Need manual schema update in Notion interface

tests.name: Page Creation Test
tests.notes: Cannot create pages until database schema is updated with required properties

tests.name: Page Update Test
tests.notes: Cannot update pages until database schema is updated with required properties

next_actions: Update Notion database schema manually to add required properties
Add Status, Type, Priority, Owner properties to database
Test page creation after schema update
Execute page creation and update tests
Verify all tests pass before proceeding to Task N2

error_log.error: Database schema incomplete - missing required properties for MCP integration
error_log.details: Current database only has 'Name' property, needs Status, Type, Priority, Owner, etc.
